description: This restaurant housed in an 18C building is run by its talented and enthusiastic owners Sergio (front of house) and Annarita (in the kitchen), who do their utmost to provide guests with the best seasonal, regional ingredients prepared in classic dishes full of flavour. The wine list focuses on good-quality labels from the region.
